The specific claims made in the news rep: such as the promise of "Muslim-only" schemes and benefits exclusively for Muslims and minority sections in Telangana.
The statements made by political analyst: such as the affirmation that the Congress party's manifesto includes the construction of hospitals and schools exclusively for Muslims.
The reference to the manifesto itself: which outlines the promise of free power supply to mosques and churches, special opportunities in government contracts for Muslim youth, aid to poor Muslim students, residential schools for Muslims, hospitals for minorities, special Urdu District Selection Committee (DSC) for minorities, and punishment to firms for hiring based on religion.
The comparison of the manifesto: s promises for mosques and churches with the absence of similar promises for temples, as highlighted by the news reports and discussions.
